text: Gilbert William Gutknecht Jr. (born March 20, 1951) is an American politician. Gutknecht was a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives from Minnesota's 1st congressional district from 1995 until 2007. Gutknecht lost his 2006 re-election bid to DFL candidate Tim Walz. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from Iowa Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:People from Cedar Falls, Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gil Gutknecht
